Self.Wiki: Determines the behavior parameters used when triggering projectiles and attacks.

variationId.Wiki: Used when calculating the ID for attack parameters. It is not used directly on the actual machine.

behaviorJudgeId.Wiki: Used when calculating the ID for attack parameters. This ID matches the action judgment ID entered in TAE.

ezStateBehaviorType_old.Wiki: The EzState behavior type to use for ID calculation.

refType.Wiki: Which param type to reference for attack behavior.

refId.Wiki: The ID to call for attack behavior. Param used is determined by refType.

sfxVariationId.Wiki: Offset applied to the particle ID invoked in the TAE event.

stamina.Wiki: Set the amount of stamina consumed during action.

mp.Wiki: Set the amount of MP consumed during action.

category.Wiki: The action category this behavior belongs to.

heroPoint.Wiki: Set the amount of humanity consumed during action.
